about_the_game:
This is an RPG maker 2D interactive game with plot and micro-puzzle. Through multi-branch options, you can reach different endings at the end. There are a total of five endings for players to refer to.
In the game, players take the perspective of the protagonist, explore everything in their home at midnight, and get the truth after dawn. The story takes place in the 1990s, in a family with strong roots in Eastern culture. The protagonist is a little girl who grows up under the care of her parents. Growth brings not only love, but also the awakening of her own consciousness of exploration and her understanding of the world. Knowledge, self-awareness in the current environment, the rise of one's own consciousness. Driven by curiosity, in the exploration of daily affairs around you, you will unlock unfamiliar information. In the end, all answers will be obtained after dawn. Please pay attention to your Fatigue value, pay attention to your inventory.
Special Notice:
For players who have already downloaded this game, the error that caused the game to fail to start after downloading some time ago has been corrected. Please delete the old game and download it again to start the game normally. 2024/07/16

content_descriptors.notes: Involving "spoilers", part of the content involves that after minors were violated, the perpetrators were sanctioned by relevant government units.

detailed_description:
This is an RPG maker 2D interactive game with plot and micro-puzzle. Through multi-branch options, you can reach different endings at the end. There are a total of five endings for players to refer to.
In the game, players take the perspective of the protagonist, explore everything in their home at midnight, and get the truth after dawn. The story takes place in the 1990s, in a family with strong roots in Eastern culture. The protagonist is a little girl who grows up under the care of her parents. Growth brings not only love, but also the awakening of her own consciousness of exploration and her understanding of the world. Knowledge, self-awareness in the current environment, the rise of one's own consciousness. Driven by curiosity, in the exploration of daily affairs around you, you will unlock unfamiliar information. In the end, all answers will be obtained after dawn. Please pay attention to your Fatigue value, pay attention to your inventory.

name: morning

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: window7(SP1+) and above
  • Processor: ×68 or ×86
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM

short_description: This is a 2D game. Players operate the mouse, click to explore and obtain props, watch dialogue to advance the plot, and play the role of the protagonist alone in a house late at night, exploring daily and unfamiliar things, and unfolding the truth of her life.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal
